description: Languages supported: English Carry the pocket guide to help you choose ocean-friendly seafood wherever you live or travel (targeted to USA). This is an unofficial webOS front end to the Sustainable Seafood Guide published by the Monterey Bay Aquarium. - The source guide is written for U.S. regions but the information should be usable elsewhere. - Tap the 'Seafood Watch' icon to open the official website. - Tap a guide button to view the 'Seafood Guide' or 'Sushi Guide'. - Select the guide for a specific region from the app menu. - Tap the information icon to learn about the Seafood Watch categories. - Tap the search icon to search for fish on the Seafood Watch website. - The app will try to locate your region with GPS (USA only) to provide the proper regional guide.
